Drug dealing is a serious problem affecting many communities
Is fadhb thromchúiseach í mangaireacht drugaí a chuireann isteach ar go leor pobal
One of the biggest barriers to dealing effectively with drug dealers is the use of intimidation by drug dealers to prevent people from reporting drug dealing

Ar cheann de na baic is mó maidir le déileáil go héifeachtúil le mangairí drugaí tá an t-imeaglú á dhéanann mangairí drugaí ar dhaoine chun cosc a chur orthu tuairisc a thabhairt faoi mhangaireacht drugaí
Dial to Stop Drug Dealing
Diailigh chun Mangaireacht Drugaí a Stopadh
Dial to Stop Drug Dealing is an initiative to tackle drug dealing in local communities around Ireland
Tá Diailigh chun Mangaireacht Drugaí a Stopadh tionscnamh é chun tabhairt faoi mhangaireacht drugaí i bpobail áitiúla ar fud na hÉireann
It provides a confidential and completely anonymous way for individuals to pass on information on drug dealing in their local community
Cuireann sé bealach rúnda agus gan ainm ar fáil do dhaoine aonair chun faisnéis a thabhairt faoi mhangaireacht drugaí ina bpobal áitiúil
When people are reporting drug dealing activity, they are never asked for their names or addresses, or any other information which might identify them
Nuair a thuairiscíonn daoine gníomhaíochtaí mangaireachta drugaí, ní iarrtar a gcuid ainmneacha ná a gcuid seoltaí orthu, ná aon fhaisnéis eile a d’fhéadfadh iad a aithint
How to report suspicions of drug dealing
Conas tuairisc a thabhairt nuair atáthar amhrasach faoi mhangaireacht drugaí
Following a review of the initiative, since 2012 anyone wishing to pass on information on drug dealing should call the Crimestoppers freephone confidential number 1800 25 00 25
Tar éis athbhreithniú ar an tionscnamh, ó 2012 ba cheart aon duine ar mian chun pas a fháil ar fhaisnéis maidir le mangaireacht drugaí glaoch ar an uimhir Crimestoppers rúnda saorghlao 1800 25 00 25
If you have information on drug dealing activity in your community you can telephone the freephone number
Má tá faisnéis agat faoi ghníomhaíochtaí mangaireachta drugaí i do phobal is féidir leat glaoch ar an uimhir saorghlao
You will get through to a trained operator who will ask you for your information and nothing more
Cuirfear ar aghaidh chuig oibrí oilte tú a gheobhaidh do chuid faisnéise uait, agus é sin amháin
The calls are handled by staff that have been trained to deal with the sensitivities around the issue
Tá na glaonna á láimhseáil ag foireann oibre atá oilte chun na híogaireachtaí a bhaineann leis an ábhar a láimhseáil
You will not be asked for your name and your number will not be traced
Ní iarrfar d’ainm ort agus ní dhéanfar d’uimhir a lorg
No one will know that you have called
Ní bheidh a fhios ag aon duine go ndearna tú an glaoch
The information gathered is passed on directly to the Garda National Drugs Unit (GNDU) which assesses its usefulness
Cuirtear an fhaisnéis a bhailítear ar aghaidh díreach chuig Aonad Náisiúnta Drugaí an Gharda Síochána a dhéanann measúnú uirthi
The GNDU passes relevant information on to the Gardaí in the specified area for investigation
Seolann Aonad Náisiúnta Drugaí an Gharda Síochána faisnéis ar aghaidh chuig na Gardaí sa cheantar sonrach i gcomhair imscrúdaithe
The Gardaí can use the information to build a case against a known drug dealer, to investigate new allegations of drug dealing activity in a community or to make an arrest

Is féidir leis na Gardaí an fhaisnéis a úsáid chun cás a chur le chéile i gcoinne mangaire drugaí aitheanta, chun imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar líomhaintí nua faoi mhangaireacht drugaí i bpobal nó chun duine a ghabháil
There is information on the Government’s strategy for dealing with the drug problem (pdf) here
Tá faisnéis faoi straitéis an Rialtais chun an fhadhb drugaí a láimhseáil (pdf) ar fáil anseo
